title: SchemaDefinition
description: A reusable JSON Schema definition declared under the 'definitions' keyword and referenced via '$ref: #/definitions/{name}'. Enables DRY schema design and consistent type definitions across entities.

description.description: Human-readable explanation of this definition's purpose (JSON Schema Draft 7 annotation keyword)

format.description: Semantic format hint for string-typed definitions (e.g., date-time, email, uri)

enum.description: Restricts the value of this definition to a fixed set of allowed values

examples.description: Sample values illustrating valid instances of this definition (JSON Schema Draft 7 annotation keyword)
